actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Warren G. Harding National Historic Site in the State of Ohio.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Warren G. Harding National Historic Site. Provides that such site shall include the Harding Home, Museum and Memorial located in Marion, Ohio. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as may be necessary to carry out the purpose of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Warren G. Harding National Historic Site in the State of Ohio.
